New Records: South Africa posted their highest total of the tournament so far with 194-4.
Key Match Events: South Africa beat USA by 18 runs in their Super Eight match at the T20 World Cup 2024.
Gous scored an unbeaten 80 for the USA.
Rabada took 3 wickets for 18 runs for South Africa.
de Kock scored 74 runs for South Africa.
Netravalkar took 2 wickets for 21 runs for the USA.
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa captain Markram said the win was bigger than the margin suggests and praised Gous's performance.
USA captain Jones felt the match could have been closer and emphasized the need for more discipline.
de Kock, the Player of the Match, expressed satisfaction with his performance and highlighted the importance of upcoming games against England and West Indies.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium, North Sound, Antigua.
South Africa made it five wins from five in the competition to this stage.
USA earned respect for their performance against a cricket powerhouse.
